title: New: HANA – Clay
body:
With Grimes, Lorde and Lana Del Rey already declaring themselves fans,  it’s clear that **HANA** (Hana Pestle) may well be onto something rather special.

Subtle and beautifully composed, her debut track, _Clay_, hints at chart aimed pop hooks, yet the cutting sadness to her lyrics helps keep it grounded, refusing to drift into the realms of feeling contrived or forced. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
